mapper.insert: insert into stock (symbol, fullName, description, sector, m_capitalization, per, eps, pxt_insiders, pxt_institutions, year_high, year_low, avg_target) values (#{symbol}, #{fullName}, #{description}, #{sector}, #{m_capitalization}, #{per}, #{eps}, #{pxt_insiders}, #{pxt_institutions}, #{year_high}, #{year_low}, #{avg_target})
insert into earning(symbol, reportedDate, reportedEPS, estimatedEPS) values (#{symbol}, #{reportedDate}, #{reportedEPS}, #{estimatedEPS})
mapper.select: select * from earning where symbol = #{symbol} and reportedDate > '2017-12-31'
select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rowNum, s.* from stock s, (select @rownum:=0) temp where symbol is not null order by m_capitalization desc limit #{cal_idx}, #{countPerPage}
mapper.update: update stock set cur_price = #{cur_price} where symbol = #{symbol}
update account set cur_price = #{cur_price} where symbol = #{symbol}
mapper.delete: delete from watch where email = #{email} and symbol = #{symbol}
mapper.select: select count(symbol) as cnt from stock where symbol is not null

choose.when: symbol like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or fullName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or sector like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
